author: A.D. Rangarajan
title: Guy with positive outlook tests negative in Tirupati!
description: Those with symptoms should get tested to improve their chances of survival, he says
content: The 25-year-old student made eyebrows rise when he became the first in Chittoor district to be declared COVID-19 positive. Tirupati, which was already tense in view of its huge pilgrim footfall with the likelihood of carriers being among the visitors to the t… [+2543 chars]
